invocation.name: Ak-Syt's Peace I
invocation.description: Prevents target from entering shock or loosing consciousness for one hour per ten rolled.

invocation.name: Emyn's Cut I
invocation.description: Causes an edged weapon to take on the attributes of Emyn. The damage bonus of the weapon is increased by one fifth the invocation roll for the coming battle.

invocation.name: Shield of Amanya I
invocation.description: Grants a soak bonus equal to half invocation roll against fire damage for an hour.

invocation.name: Flame of Gashang II
invocation.description: Causes the head of a mace to burst into flame, during fire damage equal to half invocation roll. The fire damage is calculated seperately from the normal damage from the mace. Lasts for a battle.

invocation.name: Ilpylen's Shield II
invocation.description: Subject gains a bonus to soak against fire damage of twice the invocation roll. Lasts a day.

invocation.name: Mamaka's Cry II
invocation.description: Causes an immediate fear check for everyone one in range (followers of Agrik gain a +20 bonus). The Difficulty is the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Pameshlu's Curse II
invocation.description: One chosen subject suffers a penalty equal to one fifth the invocation roll to all combat skills for the duration of a combat.

invocation.name: Searing Hand II
invocation.description: A ball of mundane fire appears in the priest's hand, and will burn for as long as wanted. It does damage equal to one half the invocation roll. It can be thrown up to the range of the invocation as an attack.

invocation.name: Torturer's Insight II
invocation.description: Provides the priest with knowledge of any fears or phobias of the victim. Gives a bonus to any torturing or intimidation skill rolls of one fifth the invocation.

invocation.name: Touch if the V'Hir II
invocation.description: Inflicts a severe jolt of pain on a victim. They suffer stun damage of one half the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Agrik's Respite II
invocation.description: Stops bloodloss and heals one wound level from the subject.

invocation.name: Agrik's Rot II
invocation.description: Causes an open wound to become infected.

invocation.name: Crimson Dance II
invocation.description: Produces battle frenzy in the priest's allies, for the duration of the next battle. They get a bonus equal to one fifth invocation to initiative, attack and damage rolls, and a penalty of double this to defence rolls. All allies in range are affected.

invocation.name: Flames of the V'Hir II
invocation.description: Priest self-immolates, and is envoloped in etheral flames for up to 15 minutes. Priest is immune to the fire, but anyone who comes within reach suffers fire damage equal to the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Intimidation II
invocation.description: Causes the invoker to appear powerful, and increases his leadership or intimidation skills by one fifth the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Lord of Fire II
invocation.description: Priest can control the direction and intensity of any ethereal or mundane fire within range. Control lasts for duration of fire, or priest's interest, whichever is shorter.

invocation.name: Armour of Okayra III
invocation.description: Increases soak of armour by one fifth invocation roll. Lasts for duration of a battle.

invocation.name: Blade of Sycanus III
invocation.description: Blesses any edged weapon, turning it into a flaming sickle for the duration of a battle. It gets a damage bonus of one fifth the invocation roll, plus any hit is automatically a killing blow (no penalties). If a hit fails to kill, then the invocation is terminated.

invocation.name: Pillar of Fire III
invocation.description: Calls down a pillar of mundane fire which can be directed at a specific target. Does damage equal to the invocation roll.

invocation.name: Khamar's Spawn III
invocation.description: One drop of fresh blood from the priest transforms into a fire elemental. The size of the elemental is equal to one third the invocation roll.
